name: highest_power_of_2
description: Create a Scratch program that finds the highest power of 2 less than or equal to a given number. The sprite should say the result.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that finds the highest power of 2 less than or equal to a given number. The sprite should say the result.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: highest_power_of_2
